wikramarachchi mahatha dinamina kathuwaraya bawata pathwiya. 1919 sita 1924 dakwa dinamina unnathiya wenuwen mahangu meheyak itukala ohu, sabawin ma me puwathpathata aashirwadayakma wiya.mul kalayedi dinamina paththara kanthoruwa thibune kolambaa chatham widiyeya.
